text: Colonia del Sacramento () is a city in southwestern Uruguay, by the RÃ­o de la Plata, facing the Argentine capital Buenos Aires. It is the oldest town in the country and capital of the Colonia Department. Around 27,000 people lived there. Its historic quarter is a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1995. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Cities in Uruguay Category:Capitals of Uruguayan departments Category:World Heritage Sites in South America Category:Colonia Department
title: Colonia del Sacramento
